content:
This website was created with the static site generator Hugo using the PaperMod theme and is hosted on Netlify.
This website uses Google Analytics, which uses cookies. Please see Google’s Privacy Policy, Technologies, and How Google Uses Cookies for more information.
Additionally, this website uses giscus for comments. giscus uses cookies: Please see giscus’ Privacy Policy for more information.
Lastly, this site remembers your theme preference (light or dark) in a cookie.
It is possible that Hugo, PaperMod, and Netlify collect information in ways that I am not aware of. Apart from the information described here and data collection I am not aware of, no other information is collected, stored, or evaluated.
title: Privacy Policy

content:
Feel free to add me on Discord!
Click here to add me from the browser (you need to be logged in).
Otherwise, add me via my Discord username, slyprey.
summary: Link to my Discord profile and my Discord username.
title: Discord
